member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.BlockHighlighter.IsHighLevel(DevExpress.CodeRush.StructuralParser.LanguageElement)
member.summary: Returns true if this is a high-level language element, like a class, struct, etc.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.BlockHighlighter.SelectionBarStyle
member.summary: Determines the thickness of the selection bars. Thick bars are two pixels wide. Thin bars are one pixel wide.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.BlockHighlighter.DrawSelectionBars
member.summary: If true, the source range will have selection bars drawn at the upper left and bottom right corners of the selection.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.BlockHighlighter.OutlineRange
member.summary: If true, the highlighted source range will also be outlined in a color that is 30% the transparency of LineColor.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.BlockHighlighter.FillRange
member.summary: If true, the highlighted source range will also be "filled" with a 15% transparent overlay in LineColor.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.BlockHighlighter.IsSelection
member.summary: If true, the highlighted source range will be painted as editor selection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.BigHint.StickToTextView(DevExpress.CodeRush.Core.MessageHintBase,DevExpress.CodeRush.Core.TextView,System.Int32,System.Int32,DevExpress.CodeRush.StructuralParser.SourceRange)
member.summary: Sticks the given hint to the specified text view using passed line and offset. The hint will be shown while caret is in the specified source range. If caret will move out of the range, then the hint will be closed.
member.param: The line number where to stick the hint.
The offset number where to stick the hint.
The SourceRange that will be used to validate the hint.

The SourceRange that will be used to validate the hint.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.AddHandler(System.Object)
member.summary: Used to keep an internal list of event handlers for this plug-in so that they can be removed from the EventNexus when this DXCoreEvents instance is disposed. All events in should call this method when a handler is added.

member.name: M:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.RemoveHandler(System.Object)
member.summary: Used to keep an internal list of event handlers for this plug-in so that they can be removed from the EventNexus when this DXCoreEvents instance is disposed. All events in should call this method when a handler is removed.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.BuildBegin
member.summary: Occurs before the solution builds, before a batch build begins, or just before a project begins to build.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.BuildDone
member.summary: Occurs after a solution build completes.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ProjectBuildBegin
member.summary: Occurs when a project configuration build begins.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ProjectBuildDone

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.CommandExecuting
member.summary: Occurs when a Visual Studio command is about to execute.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.CommandExecuted
member.summary: Occurs when Visual Studio command has been executed.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DebuggerContextChanged
member.summary: Occurs whenever the current process, program, thread, or stack is changed.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DebuggerEnterBreakMode
member.summary: Occurs when the debugger enters break mode. This event is fired regardless of how break mode is established.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DebuggerEnterDesignMode
member.summary: Occurs when the debugger leaves run mode or debug mode. This event is fired whenever design mode is established after debugging.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DebuggerEnterRunMode
member.summary: Occurs when entering run mode. This event may not fire when stepping. It is typically best used when you are updating the user interface.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DebuggerExceptionNotHandled
member.summary: Thrown before OnEnterBreakMode.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DebuggerExceptionThrown
member.summary: Thrown before OnEnterBreakMode.

member.summary: Occurs when a window is created or a document is opened.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.WindowMoved
member.summary: Occurs when a window is moved.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DocumentClosing

member.summary: Occurs when a document is deactivated.

member.summary: Occurs when a designer is deactivated.

member.summary: Occurs when a designer is activated.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ProjectSelectionChange
member.summary: Occurs when a selection in the Solution Explorer changes. This event is also fired when project files are renamed.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.AfterClosingSolution
member.summary: Occurs immediately after closing a solution.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.BeforeClosingSolution
member.summary: Occurs immediately before closing a solution.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.SolutionOpened

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ProjectAdded

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ProjectRemoved

member.summary: Occurs just before Visual Studio shuts down.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.MacrosRuntimeReset
member.summary: Occurs when the macro runtime execution engine resets, clearing all global variable data and losing all event connections.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.StartupComplete
member.summary: Occurs after the host application completes its startup routines, provided that both DXCore and your Add-in load at environment startup.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.FindDone
member.summary: Occurs after a Find-in-files with a results list operation completes.

member.summary: Occurs immediately after you open a file that is not contained inside of any open projects.

member.summary: Occurs immediately after you rename a file that is not contained inside of any open projects.

member.summary: Occurs immediately after you add a solution item to the solution.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.SolutionItemRemoved
member.summary: Occurs immediately after you remove a solution item from the solution.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.SolutionItemRenamed

member.summary: Occurs after changing the solution configuration.

member.summary: Occurs when DXCore options have changed.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.BeforeParse
member.summary: Occurs before DXCore is about to parse a file.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.AfterParse
member.summary: Occurs after the DXCore parses a file.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.AfterPreprocessMacro
member.summary: Occurs after the DXCore parses a file.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.FeatureInvoked
member.summary: Occurs when a feature that displays an ActionHint is invoked. This event will fire even if the ActionHint is disabled.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseDoubleClick
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse double-clicks in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseEnter
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse enters the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseLeave
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse leaves the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseHover
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse is hovering in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseDown
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse is down in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseUp
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse is up in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseMove
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse is moved in the editor. This event only fires if the editor has focus. It will not fire if the VS menu system is active (e.g., the editor context menu is up or a VS 2005 smart tag is active).

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMouseWheel
member.summary: Occurs when the mouse wheel is moved in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorCharacterCancelled
member.summary: Occurs when a character being typed in the editor has been cancelled by another plug-in.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorCharacterTyping
member.summary: Occurs when a character is being typed in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorCharacterTyped
member.summary: Occurs when a character is typed in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorContextMenuShowing
member.summary: Occurs when the context menu is about to be displayed in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorFontChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the user changes the editor font.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorIdle
member.summary: Occurs when the editor initially becomes idle, and is subsequently called at repeated intervals until the editor returns to an active state.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorMappingChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the Visual Studio remaps the lines visible in editor. This happens when a region is expanded or collapsed, word wrapping is enabled or a file is opened in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorPaintBackground
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is painting, called before the EditorPaint event, used for low-priority screen adornments that can be overlapped by higher priority adornments.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorPaint
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is painting.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorPaintLanguageElement
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is painting, called once for each language element in the text view.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorPaintString
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is painting, called once for each string in the text view.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorPaintComment
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is painting, called once for each comment in the text view.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorPaintXmlDocComment
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is painting, called once for each XML Doc comment in the text view.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorPaintForeground
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is painting, called after the EditorPaint event, used for high-priority screen adornments that should not be obscurred by other adornments.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorScrolled
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is scrolled.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorValidateClipRegion
member.summary: Occurs before Visual Studio paints a TextView. If your plug-in paints entirely over an area of the view, you can handle this event to block out the area that will be painted. This will prevent Visual Studio from painting in areas you reserve.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.EditorValidateLanguageElementClipRegion
member.summary: Occurs before Visual Studio paints a TextView, called once for each LanguageElement in view. If your plug-in paints entirely over an area of the view that corresponds to a LanguageElement, you can handle this event to block out the area that will be painted. This will prevent Visual Studio from painting in areas you reserve.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.IntellisenseActivated
member.summary: Occurs when the intellisense is activated in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.IntellisenseDeactivated
member.summary: Occurs when the intellisense is deactivated in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.TipWindowActivated
member.summary: Occurs when the tip window is activated in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.TipWindowDeactivated
member.summary: Occurs when the tip window is deactivated in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.TextChanged
member.summary: Occurs when any text is changed in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.LineChangesCommitted
member.summary: Occurs when line changes are committed (e.g., Enter key is pressed or the cursor moves away from the line that was modified).

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.TextViewActivated
member.summary: Occurs when focus is set to a text view.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.TextViewDeactivated
member.summary: Occurs when focus is removed from a text view.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.CaretMoved
member.summary: Occurs when the line number or column changes in the active file. Also occurs when a file is activated.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DocumentSetText
member.summary: Occurs when the TextDocument.Set method is called, indicating code has been programmatically added, replaced, or deleted in the editor.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the selection changes in the active file. Also occurs when a file is activated.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DecorateEditor
member.summary: Occurs when the editor is being decorated.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.DecorateLanguageElement
member.summary: Occurs when language elements are being decorated, called once for each language element in the text view.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.SmartTagShowing
member.summary: Occurs when smart tag is about to be shown.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.SmartTagHiding
member.summary: Occurs when smart tag is about to be hidden.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.SmartTagMenuHiding
member.summary: Occurs when smart tag menu is about to be hidden.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.MarkerDropped
member.summary: Occurs when a marker is dropped.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.MarkerCollected
member.summary: Occurs when a marker is collected.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ReferenceAdded

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ReferenceChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a project reference is changed.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ReferenceRemoved

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ImportAdded

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ImportRemoved

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.LanguageElementActivated

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.GetAvailableShortcuts
member.summary: Occurs when a hinting or discoverability plug-in requests a list of available shortcuts for the current context. If you would like your plug-in to participate in this discoverability, handle this event and add the Actions that are available.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.PopupMemberMenu
member.summary: Occurs when a member popup menu appears. Handlers may add custom menu items to participate on this special menu.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.KeyPressed
member.summary: Occurs when a key is pressed in the IDE.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.VisualStudioActivated
member.summary: Occurs immediately after Visual Studio .NET becomes active.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.VisualStudioDeactivated
member.summary: Occurs immediately after Visual Studio .NET becomes inactive.

member.name: E:DevExpress.DXCore.PlugInCore.DXCoreEvents.ClipboardChanged
member.summary: Occurs when data is cut or copied to the clipboard.

member.summary: Starts the animation.

The rectangle within the window that will contain the animation.

member.summary: Stops the animation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.OnStarting
member.summary: Triggers the Starting event.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.OnStopping
member.summary: Triggers the Stopping event.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.OnDrawCell(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Draws a single cell in the animation. Returns false if the animation is complete.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.OnProgress
member.summary: Triggers the Progress event.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.RefreshTarget
member.summary: Invalidates and repaints the animated area on the target. No animation is drawn in this method. This method is called before animation starts (which gives the window a chance to draw any last-minute changes before acquiring a background image for the target window. This method is also called at the end of the animation sequence to clear any final frames of the animation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.AnimationComplete
member.summary: Calculates PercentRemaining and returns false if animation frames remain, or true if we're out of time (e.g., animation time exceeds Duration).

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.EraseArea(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Erases the specified area by copying from the background image onto the specified rectangle.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.GetBackgroundImage(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Gets a background image from the specified area.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.GetBackgroundImage
member.summary: Gets the background bitmap to work with.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.GetDestinationRectangle
member.summary: Gets the destination rectangle to draw a cell of animation to.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.PrepareToDrawSingleFrame
member.summary: Called before committing changes for each cell of animation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.DoPaint
member.summary: Prepares a special Graphics object that contains a clean background to animate across. Calls DrawCell, passing that Graphics object as a parameter.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.Tick(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Timer tick -- drives the animation.

member.name: E:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.Starting
member.summary: Occurs before animation commences.

member.name: E:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.Stopping
member.summary: Occurs when animation completes or is interrupted.

member.name: E:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.DrawCell
member.summary: Occurs for each frame of animation. Use the PercentRemaining property of the AnimationFrame to determine what to draw.

member.name: E:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.DrawOutOfBounds
member.summary: Occurs when painting occurs entirely outside the TargetRectangle and the client rectangle of the window we are animating in.

member.name: E:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.Progress
member.summary: Occurs for each frame of animation when the PecentRemaining property is changed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.TargetFrame
member.summary: The target rectangle in the window where animation is rendered.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.Duration
member.summary: Animation duration, in milliseconds.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.Center
member.summary: The center of the target frame.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.PercentRemaining
member.summary: Calculated percentage (between 0 and 1) of the remaining animation. Based on Duration and the number of milliseconds that have passed since the animation started.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimationFrame.IsActive
member.summary: True if the animation is currently running.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiMovingAnimation.OnDrawCell(System.Drawing.Graphics)
member.summary: Calls EraseLastFrame() followed by base functionality (to trigger any event handlers).

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiMovingAnimation.GetAffectedRectangle
member.summary: Returns a rectangle that encloses areas drawn in and erased in this animation cell.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiMovingAnimation.PrepareToDrawSingleFrame
member.summary: Called by base class before committing changes for each cell of animation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiMovingAnimation.EraseLastFrame
member.summary: Erases the last part of the graphics that we drew in.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiMovingAnimation.Start(DevExpress.CodeRush.Win32.HWND,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Starts the animation.
member.param: The rectangle that covers the entire animation.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiMovingAnimation.StopAnimationOnOutOfBounds
member.summary: If true, animation will end when drawing happens completely out of bounds. If you set this property to true, make sure your animation doesn't start out of bounds (e.g., offscreen), or it will never be seen. You can also handle the DrawOutOfBounds event if you want to have greater control over when animation stops.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.InitializeArrowColor
member.summary: Initializes the colors for all pieces of the arrow.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.InitializeArrowShapes(System.Drawing.SizeF)
member.summary: Initializes the arrow shapes to fit inside the specified SizeF object.
member.param: The SizeF object that specifies the width and height of this arrow.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.Rotate(System.Single)
member.summary: Rotates the arrow by the specified angle. Note that rotations are cumulative. Rotating twice by 45 degrees is equivalent to a single 90 degree rotation. Arrow initially points to the right, so rotating 270 degrees will have it pointing straight up.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.AngleFromPoints(System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Returns the angle needed to rotate a line pointing right (on the horizontal) with the origin at source, so it intercects with target.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.Start(DevExpress.CodeRush.Win32.HWND,System.Drawing.PointF,System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Starts the AnimatedArrow animation. Note: If you are animating over a TextView, you might want to use one of the other Start method overloads that accept a TextView.
member.param: HWND to the window we are animating in.
The starting PointF of the animation.
The ending PointF of the animation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.Start(DevExpress.CodeRush.Core.TextView,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Animates a moving arrow between the specified points in the code in the specified TextView.
member.param: The line number of the starting point of the animation.
The character offset of the starting point of the animation.
The line number of the ending point of the animation.
The character offset of the ending point of the animation.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.Start(DevExpress.CodeRush.Core.TextView,EnvDTE.EditPoint,EnvDTE.EditPoint)
member.summary: Starts the arrow-pointing animation, running from the specified start point to the stop point.
member.param: The EditPoint that marks the start of the animation.
The EditPoint that marks the end of the animation.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.BorderOpacity
member.summary: The opacity of the arrow border. 255 is opaque; 0 is transparent.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.FillOpacity
member.summary: The opacity of the arrow fill. 255 is opaque; 0 is transparent.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.BorderColor
member.summary: The border color of the arrow.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.FillColor
member.summary: The fill color of the arrow.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.GdiAnimatedArrow.PixelsPerSecond
member.summary: Sets the arrow velocity in pixels per second. Must be between 10 and 3000. Default is 200.

member.summary: Gets the target rectangle needed to contain the points.

member.summary: Starts the CornerBeacon animation. CornerBeacons draw four corner locator beacons and are useful for drawing attention to selections and rectangular areas of the screen.
member.param: A SourcePoint representing the upper left corner of the beacon.
A SourcePoint representing the upper right corner of the beacon.
A SourcePoint representing the lower right corner of the beacon.
A SourcePoint representing the lower left corner of the beacon.

member.summary: Starts the CornerBeacon animation. CornerBeacons draw four corner locator beacons and are useful for drawing attention to selections and rectangular areas of the screen.
member.param: A SourcePoint representing the upper left corner of the beacon.
A SourcePoint representing the upper right corner of the beacon.
A SourcePoint representing the lower right corner of the beacon.
A SourcePoint representing the lower left corner of the beacon.
The distance out from the corners that the animation should start.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.ShapeCollection.SpreadBorderColor(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the border color of all shapes to a gradual blend between startColor (assigned to the first shape in the collection) and stopColor (assigned to the last shape in the collection).
member.param: The color for the first shape in the collection.
The color for the last shape in the collection.
The opacity for all borders. 255 is opaque; 0 is transparent.

member.name: M:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.ToolWindowPlugIn.SetTabPicture(EnvDTE.Window)
member.summary: Can be overridden to perform custom setting of the tab picture for this tool window.
member.param: The EnvDTE.Window to call SetTabPicture on.
member.returns: Return true if the tab picture was set; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.ToolWindowPlugIn.Title
member.summary: The title/caption of your Tool Window. If you intend to update this dynamically, we recommend that you do this in the form of "MyToolWindow - my additional information". Visual Studio uses the title text for the tab (when your tool window is docked). If the title includes the text " -", Visual Studio will use only the text before the " -" for the tab (e.g., "MyToolWindow"). This allows you to change the Title without changing the text of the tab when docked.

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.ToolWindowPlugIn.Image
member.summary: Load a 16x16 image, 16-bit depth, using only the standard 16 Windows colors (for compatibility with VS 2002 and VS 2003). The background (transparent) color should be RGB (0, 254, 0).

member.name: P:DevExpress.CodeRush.PlugInCore.ToolWindowPlugIn.IsAutoHides
member.summary: Returns true if window auto hide mode is on.
